product_name: DAKINE Descent Bike Jersey - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Featuring lightweight, breathable fabric and a relaxed fit, the DAKINE Descent Bike Jersey keeps you cool whether you're riding singletrack trails or just around the neighborhood. Polyester fabric wicks moisture away from skin and dries quickly. DAKINE Descent Bike Jersey features a handy interior eyewear chamois for wiping down sunglasses. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring lightweight, breathable fabric and a relaxed fit, the DAKINE Descent Bike Jersey keeps you cool whether you're riding singletrack trails or just around the neighborhood.
